page_analysis.text_content:
Parking

Parking space standards

Parking regulations affect the appearance of the streetscapes in our residential neighborhoods by minimizing the number of cars parked on the street and in the front yards by requiring that there are parking spaces available deeper into the lot.

Code sections
Page 34
18.12.060, 18.83.090
Page 35
18.83.090, 18.83.110(a)
Page 36
18.12.060
Page 37
18.12.040 (f)
Page 38
18.12.060
Page 39
18.12.080 (b)

34

• Two spaces are required on the lot (per dwelling).

• They may NOT be located in the required front yard or, first 10 ft of, required street side yard.

• 2nd dwelling units have same requirements.

• No underground parking garages except by variance.

• One of the two spaces must be covered.

• To be considered detached, a covered-parking structure must be a minimum of 3' from the main dwelling.

• Minimum size for an uncovered space is 8.5' x 18'.

• Minimum clearance inside a covered parking structure to be 10' x 20' for each space. Therefore, a two-car garage or carport to be 20' x 20' clear inside.

• Minimum vertical clearance: 7'.

* Clear area for parking space must be free of other uses e.g., water heaters, clothes washers or dryer, bicycle parking facilities, etc.

Fig 28 Parking space dimensions for garage and uncovered space in plan view

[Diagram shows parking space dimensions with measurements: 10' min inside clearance, 20' min inside clearance, Required covered space, 2nd space (uncovered), Tandem O.K., 18' min, uncovered space, 8.5' min uncovered space]

visual_elements.description: Technical diagram labeled 'Fig 28 Parking space dimensions for garage and uncovered space in plan view' showing two parking spaces in tandem configuration. The top space is covered (shown in black outline) and the bottom space is uncovered. Includes detailed measurements: 10' minimum inside clearance width, 20' minimum inside clearance length for covered space, 18' minimum length for uncovered space, 8.5' minimum width for uncovered space. Shows two car silhouettes positioned within the spaces. Includes asterisk symbols marking specific measurement points and notes 'Tandem O.K.' and directional indicator 'N'.
visual_elements.location: Right side of page, middle to bottom

technical_specifications.parameter: Detached structure minimum distance from main dwelling

additional_notes: Page number 34 appears at bottom left
Asterisk symbol (*) used to denote special note about clear area requirements
Figure 28 reference included with technical diagram

conditions.text: Two spaces are required on the lot
They may NOT be located in the required front yard or, first 10 ft of, required street side yard
One of the two spaces must be covered
a covered-parking structure must be a minimum of 3' from the main dwelling
Minimum size for an uncovered space is 8.5' x 18'
Minimum clearance inside a covered parking structure to be 10' x 20'
a two-car garage or carport to be 20' x 20' clear inside
Clear area for parking space must be free of other uses e.g., water heaters, clothes washers or dryer, bicycle parking facilities, etc.

logical_relationships.expression: Two spaces are required AND they may NOT be located in front yard or first 10 ft of street side yard
To be considered detached, a covered-parking structure must be a minimum of 3' from the main dwelling
Minimum clearance inside a covered parking structure to be 10' x 20' for each space. Therefore, a two-car garage or carport to be 20' x 20' clear inside

execution_sequence.action: Verify two parking spaces are provided on the lot
Check that spaces are not located in prohibited areas
Verify minimum dimensions for uncovered spaces
Verify minimum clearances for covered spaces
